mapper.insert: insert into SYS_SystemLog ( UserID, OperateTypeID, ModuleID, LogTypeID, LogContent, LogDateTime, IP, SourceMethod ) values ( #{userId}, #{operateTypeID}, #{moduleID}, #{logTypeID}, #{logContent}, #{logDateTime}, #{ip}, #{sourceMethod} )
mapper.select:
SELECT log.id, [user].userName, dic1.DataValue AS operateType, log.ModuleID, me.Name moduleName, log.logTypeID, log.logContent, log.logDateTime AS logDateTime, log.ip FROM SYS_SystemLog log LEFT JOIN SYS_User [user] ON [user].ID = log.UserID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DataCode, DataValue FROM SYS_Dictionary WHERE DictCode = 'OperateType' ) AS dic1 ON dic1.DataCode = log.OperateTypeID LEFT JOIN SYS_Menu me ON me.MenuId = log.ModuleID
and log.logDateTime >= '${sdate} 0:00:00' and log.logDateTime <= '${edate} 23:59:59'
order by ${sort} ${order}
order by logDateTime desc
Offset ${offset} Row Fetch Next ${limit} Rows Only
